AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bonesinger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen as bonesinger of his tribe. {PAWN_pronoun} created runes, made tools and things out of psychocity.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: priest of Isha
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a priest of Isha within {PAWN_possessive} tribe. The treatment of injuries, both physical and psychological, fell on {PAWN_possessive} shoulders.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warlock
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Khaine is the god of war and the warlock is his messenger. The [PAWN_nameDef] led detachments of {PAWN_possessive} tribesmen into battle, fighting with sword and magic on a par with other warriors.
